scripts.copy:env:win: copy DeliverUS-Backend\.env.example DeliverUS-Backend\.env && copy DeliverUS-Frontend-Owner\.env.example DeliverUS-Frontend-Owner\.env && copy DeliverUS-Frontend-Customer\.env.example DeliverUS-Frontend-Customer\.env
scripts.copy:env:bash: cp DeliverUS-Backend/.env.example DeliverUS-Backend/.env &&  cp DeliverUS-Frontend-Owner/.env.example DeliverUS-Frontend-Owner/.env &&  cp DeliverUS-Frontend-Customer/.env.example DeliverUS-Frontend-Customer/.env
scripts.install:backend: npm install && cd DeliverUS-Backend && npm install
scripts.test:backend: npm run migrate:backend && cd DeliverUS-Backend && npm test
scripts.start:frontend:owner: cd DeliverUS-Frontend-Owner && npx cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider expo start
scripts.start:frontend:customer: cd DeliverUS-Frontend-Customer && npx cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider expo start
scripts.install:all:win: npm run copy:env:win && npm run install:backend && npm run migrate:backend && npm run install:frontend:owner && npm run install:frontend:customer
scripts.install:all:bash: npm run copy:env:bash && npm run install:backend && npm run migrate:backend && npm run install:frontend:owner && npm run install:frontend:customer
